TITLE: Economy guide
BODY:
Quick commands:
• `{{prefix}}bal` — view your coins
• `{{prefix}}daily` — daily reward
• `{{prefix}}work` — work for coins
• `{{prefix}}moxishop list` — browse the shop
• `{{prefix}}moxishop buy <id> [amount]` — buy
• `{{prefix}}bag` — view backpack
• `{{prefix}}use <item>` — use an item
• `{{prefix}}sell <item> [amount]` — sell an item
• `{{prefix}}leaderboard` — ranking

Extras:
• `{{prefix}}collect` — timed collect
• `{{prefix}}quest` — daily quests
• `{{prefix}}race` — race cooldown
FOOTER: Tip: if something fails, check MongoDB (MONGODB).
